segments.text: I notice the woman is just standing there, drying dishes, completely oblivious to the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's just pouring out, forming a big puddle on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's going to slip and fall if she's not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're being so sneaky, trying to get cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, reaching up to the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it's about to tip over, but he doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're both trying to be quiet so the woman won't catch them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and tidy, it's like a different world out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the woman to turn around and see what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation seems like it's about to spiral out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR
